data.name: Level up your card house
data.description:
# Level up your card house

Your task is to build a card house with a given number of cards.  

![Card House Example](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

Calculate and return the number of floors you can build based on the number of cards.  
Return zero in case the number of cards is not heigh enough to build any floors or for a negative input.  

***input params***
> - nr_of_cards (integer)  
>   the maximum number of cards available to build the card house

***expected result***
> - integer >= 0  
>   the maximum number of floors that can be built

***examples***
```elixir
CardHouse.calculate_floors(1)   # returns 0
CardHouse.calculate_floors(2)   # returns 1
CardHouse.calculate_floors(52)  # returns 5
```

happy coding...
